//移动
[CmdMove]
Hotkey=M

//攻击
[CmdAttack]
Hotkey=A

//攻击地面
[CmdAttackGround]
Hotkey=X

//建造 (普通)
[CmdBuild]
Hotkey=B

///建造 (人类)
[CmdBuildHuman]
Hotkey=B

//建造 (兽人)
[CmdBuildOrc]
Hotkey=B

//建造 (暗夜精灵)
[CmdBuildNightElf]
Hotkey=B

//建造 (不死)
[CmdBuildUndead]
Hotkey=B

//取消
[CmdCancel]
Hotkey=27

//取消建造
[CmdCancelBuild]
Hotkey=27

//取消训练
[CmdCancelTrain]
Hotkey=27

//取消复活
[CmdCancelRevive]
Hotkey=27

[CmdHoldPos]
Hotkey=G

//巡逻
[CmdPatrol]
Hotkey=T

[CmdRally]
Hotkey=Y

Hotkey=V

Hotkey=S
